verses.verse: The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7752>whip,<s%> The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7494>rattling<s%> of the <S%H212>wheel,<s%> <S%H1725>Galloping<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> And <S%H7540>bounding<s%> <S%H4818>chariots!<s%>

<S%H6571>Horsemen<s%> <S%H5927>charging,<s%> <S%H2719>Swords<s%> <S%H3851>flashing,<s%> <S%H2595>spears<s%> <S%H1300>gleaming,<s%> <S%H7230>Many<s%> <S%H2491>slain,<s%> a <S%H3514>mass<s%> of <S%H6297>corpses,<s%> And <S%H369>countless<s%> <S%H9523><s%> <S%H1472>dead<s%> <S%H1472>bodies<s%> – They <S%H3782>stumble<s%> over the <S%H1472>dead<s%> <S%H1472>bodies!<s%>

[All] <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H2183>harlotries<s%> of the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> The <S%H2580>charming<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H2896>one,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> Who <S%H4376>sells<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> by her <S%H2183>harlotries<s%> And <S%H4940>families<s%> by her <S%H3785>sorceries.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> "And I will <S%H1540>lift<s%> up your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> And <S%H7200>show<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> your <S%H4626>nakedness<s%> And to the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> your <S%H7036>disgrace.<s%>
"I will <S%H7993>throw<s%> <S%H8251>filth<s%> on you And <S%H9310>make<s%> you <S%H9310>vile,<s%> And <S%H7760>set<s%> you up as a <S%H7210>spectacle.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7200>see<s%> you Will <S%H5074>shrink<s%> from you and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5210>'Nineveh<s%> is <S%H7703>devastated!<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H5110>grieve<s%> for her?' <S%H370>Where<s%> will I <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H5162>comforters<s%> for you?"

Are you <S%H3190>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> No-amon, Which was <S%H3427>situated<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> With <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> her, <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H2426>rampart<s%> [was] the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Whose <S%H2346>wall<s%> [consisted] of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>?
<S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> was [her] <S%H6109>might,<s%> And <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> too, <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H9523>limits.<s%> <S%H6316>Put<s%> and <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> were among her <S%H5833>helpers.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yet<s%> she became an <S%H1473>exile,<s%> She <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> <S%H1571>Also<s%> her small <S%H5768>children<s%> were <S%H7376>dashed<s%> to <S%H7376>pieces<s%> At the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2351>street;<s%> They <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for her <S%H3513>honorable<s%> men, And <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>men<s%> were <S%H7576>bound<s%> with <S%H9108>fetters.<s%>
You <S%H1571>too<s%> will <S%H7937>become<s%> <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> You will be <S%H5956>hidden.<s%> You <S%H1571>too<s%> will <S%H1245>search<s%> for a <S%H4581>refuge<s%> from the <S%H340>enemy.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> your <S%H4013>fortifications<s%> are <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>trees<s%> with <S%H1061>ripe<s%> <S%H1061>fruit<s%> – <S%H518>When<s%> <S%H5128>shaken,<s%> they <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the eater's <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H802>women<s%> in your <S%H7130>midst!<s%> The <S%H8179>gates<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> are <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H6605>wide<s%> to your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> <S%H784>Fire<s%> <S%H398>consumes<s%> your gate <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

<S%H7579>Draw<s%> for yourself <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H4692>siege!<s%> <S%H2388>Strengthen<s%> your <S%H4013>fortifications!<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> into the <S%H2916>clay<s%> and <S%H7429>tread<s%> the <S%H2563>mortar!<s%> <S%H2388>Take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of the <S%H4404>brick<s%> <S%H4404>mold!<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> you, The <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H3772>cut<s%> you <S%H3772>down;<s%> It will <S%H398>consume<s%> you as the <S%H3218>locust<s%> [does.] <S%H3513>Multiply<s%> yourself like the <S%H3218>creeping<s%> <S%H3218>locust,<s%> <S%H3513>Multiply<s%> yourself like the <S%H697>swarming<s%> <S%H697>locust.<s%>

You have <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H7402>traders<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> – The <S%H3218>creeping<s%> <S%H3218>locust<s%> <S%H6584>strips<s%> and <S%H5774>flies<s%> <S%H5774>away.<s%>

Your <S%H4502>guardsmen<s%> are like the <S%H697>swarming<s%> <S%H697>locust.<s%> Your <S%H2951>marshals<s%> are like <S%H1462>hordes<s%> of <S%H1462>grasshoppers<s%> <S%H2583>Settling<s%> in the stone <S%H1448>walls<s%> on a <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises<s%> and they <S%H5074>flee,<s%> And the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> they are is not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

Your <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> are <S%H5123>sleeping,<s%> O <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> Your <S%H117>nobles<s%> are <S%H7931>lying<s%> <S%H7931>down.<s%> Your <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H9448>scattered<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H6908>regather<s%> [them.]

<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3545>relief<s%> for your <S%H7667>breakdown,<s%> Your <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>incurable.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8088>about<s%> you Will <S%H8628>clap<s%> [their] <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, For on <S%H4310>whom<s%> has not your <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>?
